mapper.sql: DB.f_id,DB.f_bill_no,DB.f_address,DB.f_content,date_format(DB.f_expectDate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_expectDate,DB.f_tel,DB.f_link_name,DB.f_status,DB.f_bill_type,DB.f_pay_amount,DB.f_ptbt_amount,DB.f_cancel_reason,DB.f_pic_url,DB.f_roomId,DB.t_user_f_id,DB.t_worker_f_id,DB.t_ebuy_order_f_id,DB.f_revenue_status,DB.f_push_level,DB.f_submit_channel,date_format(DB.f_push_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_push_time,date_format(DB.f_revenue_tm,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_revenue_tm,date_format(DB.f_accept_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_accept_time,date_format(DB.f_expect_work_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_expect_work_time,date_format(DB.f_finished_tm,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_finished_tm,date_format(DB.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as f_sys0_add_time,DB.t_dredge_type_f_id,DB.t_address_block_f_id,DB.f_referrer_mobile,DB.f_cash_status,DB.t_dredge_type_2nd_f_id,DB.f_dredge_type_num,DB.f_software_bill_id

DB.f_id as DBid,DB.f_bill_no as DBbillNo,DB.f_address as DBaddress,DB.f_content as DBcontent,date_format(DB.f_expectDate,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as DBexpectdate,DB.f_tel as DBtel,DB.f_link_name as DBlinkName,DB.f_status as DBstatus,DB.f_bill_type as DBbillType,DB.f_pay_amount as DBpayAmount,DB.f_ptbt_amount as DBptbtAmount,DB.f_cancel_reason as DBcancelReason,DB.f_pic_url as DBpicUrl,DB.f_roomId as DBroomid,DB.t_user_f_id as DBtUserFId,DB.t_worker_f_id as DBtWorkerFId,DB.t_ebuy_order_f_id as DBtEbuyOrderFId,DB.f_revenue_status as DBrevenueStatus,DB.f_push_level as DBpushLevel,DB.f_submit_channel as DBsubmitChannel,date_format(DB.f_push_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as DBpushTime,date_format(DB.f_revenue_tm,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as DBrevenueTm,date_format(DB.f_accept_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as DBacceptTime,date_format(DB.f_expect_work_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as DBexpectWorkTime,date_format(DB.f_finished_tm,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as DBfinishedTm,date_format(DB.f_sys0_add_time,'%Y-%m-%d %T') as DBsys0AddTime,DB.t_dredge_type_f_id as DBtDredgeTypeFId,DB.t_address_block_f_id as DBtAddressBlockFId,DB.f_referrer_mobile as DBreferrerMobile,DB.f_cash_status as DBcashStatus,DB.t_dredge_type_2nd_f_id as DBtDredgeType2ndFId,DB.f_dredge_type_num as DBdredgeTypeNum,DB.f_software_bill_id as DBsoftwareBillId

if.test: _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == null or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == '' or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM == false or _QUERY_TYPE_IF_DIM != true

mapper.sql: UPDATE t_dredge_bill ,f_bill_no=#{billNo} ,f_address=#{address} ,f_content=#{content} ,f_expectDate=str_to_date(#{expectdate},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_tel=#{tel} ,f_link_name=#{linkName} ,f_status=#{status} ,f_bill_type=#{billType} ,f_pay_amount=#{payAmount} ,f_ptbt_amount=#{ptbtAmount} ,f_cancel_reason=#{cancelReason} ,f_pic_url=#{picUrl} ,f_roomId=#{roomid} ,t_user_f_id=#{tUserFId} ,t_worker_f_id=#{tWorkerFId} ,t_ebuy_order_f_id=#{tEbuyOrderFId} ,f_revenue_status=#{revenueStatus} ,f_push_level=#{pushLevel} ,f_submit_channel=#{submitChannel} ,f_push_time=str_to_date(#{pushTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_revenue_tm=str_to_date(#{revenueTm},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_accept_time=str_to_date(#{acceptTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_expect_work_time=str_to_date(#{expectWorkTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_finished_tm=str_to_date(#{finishedTm},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{sys0DelUser} ,t_dredge_type_f_id=#{tDredgeTypeFId} ,t_address_block_f_id=#{tAddressBlockFId} ,f_referrer_mobile=#{referrerMobile} ,f_cash_status=#{cashStatus} ,t_dredge_type_2nd_f_id=#{tDredgeType2ndFId} ,f_dredge_type_num=#{dredgeTypeNum} ,f_software_bill_id=#{softwareBillId} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{id}

update.foreach: UPDATE t_dredge_bill ,f_bill_no=#{item.billNo} ,f_address=#{item.address} ,f_content=#{item.content} ,f_expectDate=str_to_date(#{item.expectdate},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_tel=#{item.tel} ,f_link_name=#{item.linkName} ,f_status=#{item.status} ,f_bill_type=#{item.billType} ,f_pay_amount=#{item.payAmount} ,f_ptbt_amount=#{item.ptbtAmount} ,f_cancel_reason=#{item.cancelReason} ,f_pic_url=#{item.picUrl} ,f_roomId=#{item.roomid} ,t_user_f_id=#{item.tUserFId} ,t_worker_f_id=#{item.tWorkerFId} ,t_ebuy_order_f_id=#{item.tEbuyOrderFId} ,f_revenue_status=#{item.revenueStatus} ,f_push_level=#{item.pushLevel} ,f_submit_channel=#{item.submitChannel} ,f_push_time=str_to_date(#{item.pushTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_revenue_tm=str_to_date(#{item.revenueTm},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_accept_time=str_to_date(#{item.acceptTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_expect_work_time=str_to_date(#{item.expectWorkTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_finished_tm=str_to_date(#{item.finishedTm},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_add_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0AddTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_upd_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0UpdTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time=str_to_date(#{item.sys0DelTime},'%Y-%m-%d %T') ,f_sys0_del_time= sysdate() ,f_sys0_add_user=#{item.sys0AddUser} ,f_sys0_upd_user=#{item.sys0UpdUser} ,f_sys0_del_user=#{item.sys0DelUser} ,t_dredge_type_f_id=#{item.tDredgeTypeFId} ,t_address_block_f_id=#{item.tAddressBlockFId} ,f_referrer_mobile=#{item.referrerMobile} ,f_cash_status=#{item.cashStatus} ,t_dredge_type_2nd_f_id=#{item.tDredgeType2ndFId} ,f_dredge_type_num=#{item.dredgeTypeNum} ,f_software_bill_id=#{item.softwareBillId} ,f_sys0_del_state= 1 WHERE 1=1 AND f_sys0_del_state = 0 AND f_id=#{item.id}

mapper.delete:
DELETE FROM t_dredge_bill WHERE 1=1 AND f_id IN
